channel.title: Similar web sites / forums
channel.description:
I just got some pointers from [Paul][1] (on a [chat][2]) to websites supposedly trying to achieve same thing as I did when I created this site. I consider those very different attempts, but they help me realize what other people think of how clear the approach is here (currently not clear at all):
https://www.erowid.org/ http://www.shroomery.org for those mycologists out there http://www.physicsforums.com/ if physics is your thing or http://my.rsc.org
Do you have any other similar web site links? If I ever see one that's truly similar I'd gladly just drop this site. :D
[1]: http://www.freewebs.com/opend/contactus.htm [2]: https://chatbox.com/#/p=0v4VBpcPvRI=_dSc8y-vFSQHPGSqAfgW6ycY78k=
